ab.title: CXXXIIII. DE AVE PER PADVM SVPER SPVMAS SEDENTE ET TRANSEVNTE.

div.l: In spumam fluxas cogens duresoeredurescere limphas,
div.note:
CXXXII. SPATA BLMUV CINOTO Bb 1 languucit
Ba 2 adque Bx calibs B7MU, caleps Bl, calips LV
8 emollet B* gladius Bb 5 tyrsum BLMUV gestas
MU, gestans BLVb 6 uenirem B1 deeere Martia opem coni.
Schottus CXXXIII. STOMACIO Bb, STOMACHO LV, STOMACO
M; em. Schenkl in Ausonii Cent. nupt. 1 sollicita L laeui
B marciscnnt B1 3 elifans B, elephans b 4 miscans L
5 poene L1 tenere BLM, temere B (s. I. m. ree.) b 6 nescis
B b munera fort. 7 melle B b inclndera L 8 haec
Bb CXXXIIII. Carmina 134-36 solus exh. B SPVMAS B
3 fluxus b duriscere B' limfas B
div.l: Ales ut in tenero fidens tunc constitit orbe,
Otia dans pinnis, tuta premebat aquas.
De proprio pelagus calcanti suggerit alnum,
Humida cum siccam cumbala portat auem.
